services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Behind the scenes, Beyond the screen
services.headerText: I build secure, high-performance full-stack applications with seamless user experience to drive growth, not headaches.

service1.title: AI & Automation
service1.description: I transform business operations through artificial intelligence and automation. I design conversational chatbots, voicebots, and automated workflows that solve complex challenges and generate measurable impact.

service2.title: Full Stack Development
service2.description: I create complete and efficient web solutions with React, TypeScript, and Laravel. Specialized in scalable architecture, robust authentication, and optimized databases for high-performance applications.

service3.title: Specialized Frontend Development
service3.description: Responsive and pixel-perfect interfaces that users love. I master React with TypeScript, reusable components with shadcn/ui, and smooth animations with GSAP for premium web experiences.

service4.title: Project Management & Analysis
service4.description: Technical leadership with a results-focused approach. Experience in strategic analysis, technical documentation, and agile team coordination to deliver high-impact solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Code with purpose, Built to scale
about.header:
Software Engineer passionate about building scalable solutions
I develop high-performance web applications
from prototype to production
about.intro: Specialized in building fast, intuitive applications—from pixel-perfect React interfaces to robust Laravel backends. Every line of code is a promise: quality that users feel.

featuredProject.name: Nexus Learn
featuredProject.description: AI-powered learning SaaS platform that revolutionizes education with personalized virtual companions. Learn Math, Science, Languages and more through interactive voice or chat conversations.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Logic Meets Aesthetics, Effortlessly
projects.headerText: Featured projects that have been meticulously crafted with passion to generate results and impact.

project1.name: NeonFlux
project1.description: Modern landing page built with React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v3.4, and Vite. Integrates 3D elements with React Three Fiber and animations with Framer Motion.

project2.name: Nexus Learn - AI-Powered Learning Platform
project2.description: Transform your learning with AI-powered personalized virtual companions. Study Math, Science, Languages and more.

project3.name: NAR25 CSC - Professional R25 Spray Guns Website
project3.description: Immersive web experience for R25 NA CSC products, inspired by Spylt and powered by GSAP animations.

project4.name: Safe Mobility
project4.description: Experimental landing page focused on micro-interactions and smooth animations to enhance UX/UI

project5.name: Sound Bit
project5.description: Soundbit is an innovative 8D music player designed to immerse you in a unique auditory experience.

project6.name: VidSum
project6.description: VidSum: SaaS platform to summarize and analyze YouTube videos with AI. Hybrid architecture built with Next.js 14, Laravel 11, PostgreSQL and automation with n8n + Gemini.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: You Dream It, I Code It
contact.headerText: Have a question, proposal, or project idea? I'd love to hear from you and discuss further.

hero.title: Jhonatan Jácome
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
hero.text: I develop solutions with React, TypeScript, Laravel, and n8n - AI automations. I transform ideas into web applications that generate real impact.
